name: Stealth Kart
description:
In Stealth Kart, we mix Real-Time Tactics and Fun Racing. Sneak past the policemen's eyes or get into hot pursuits.
The green friend has a fast car and needs to get to the goal. One friendly kid might put the enemy into cardboard boxes or hide in one. Another friendly kid has a ramp car, allowing crazy jumps. The third kid has his dad's donut food truck, avoiding suspicion by selling donuts.

  • Real-Time Tactics meets Racing gameplay: Pick up and play, beat a level in minutes
  • Later levels are old-school challenging
  • Four playable characters, all with unique abilities
  • Local coop option: real-time tactical teamwork
  • Hide in cardboard boxes, jump over ramps, drive the ramp car, swim, distract policemen with donuts
  • Cameraderie between a green alien and friendly kids
  • Vist gramps for a few tips
  • Longtime motivation: Replay levels with different approaches for medals
  • Choose your playstyle: Hot pursuits! Or stealthy sneaking. Or making the policemen swim.
